subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Adrien scored 13 of his 17 points in the second half and No. 5 Connecticut defeated No. 25 West Virginia, 61-55, on Tuesday night.
snippet: Jeff Adrien scored 13 of his 17 points in the second half and No. 5 Connecticut defeated No. 25 West Virginia, 61-55, on Tuesday night.
